summary: After a musician commits suicide, the discovery of his dead body by his eccentric neighbors is recorded by the dead man's web cam.
cast: Emir Hadzihafizbegovic|Radoslav 'Rale' Milenkovic|Natasa Ninkovic|Ljubomir Bandovic|Bojan Zirovic|Anita Mancic|Milica Mihajlovic|Branislav Trifunovic|Aleksandar Djurica|Nikola Djuricko|Mirjana Karanovic|Nikola Kojo|Bojan Lazarov|Milos Samolov|Zelda Tinska
title: Smrt coveka na Balkanu
